PAL.NAME: Microsoft OCS 2007 R2 - CWA
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 R2 Communicator Web Access Server.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 00 - Directory Search CWA - 003 - LDAP errors
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of LDAP errors that have occurred during Communicator Web Access directory search operations.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 01 - Authentication Module CWA - 003 - Forms auth logon failures
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 003 - Forms auth logon failures

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 003 - Forms auth logon failures
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 003 - Forms auth logon failures

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 003 - Forms auth logon failures
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 003 - Forms auth logon failures

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of forms logon attempts that have failed since the Communicator Web Access virtual server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 01 - Authentication Module CWA - 007 - IWA auth logon failures
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 007 - IWA auth logon failures

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 007 - IWA auth logon failures
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 007 - IWA auth logon failures

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 007 - IWA auth logon failures
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 007 - IWA auth logon failures

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of failed logons that used IIS authentication since the Communicator Web Access virtual server was started. The IIS authentication types used are NTLM, Kerberos, or single sign on (SSO) authentication if the Communicator Web Access server is in SSO mode.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 01 - Authentication Module CWA - 012 - LDAP error total
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of authorizations that have failed due to LDAP errors during binds and searches since the Communicator Web Access virtual server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 01 - Authentication Module CWA - 014 - Logons denied due to server throttling
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 014 - Logons denied due to server throttling

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 014 - Logons denied due to server throttling
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 014 - Logons denied due to server throttling

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 014 - Logons denied due to server throttling
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 01 - Authentication Module(_Total)\CWA - 014 - Logons denied due to server throttling

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of logon attempts that were not allowed due to server throttling under heavy resource consumption.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 02 - Security CWA - 001 - Requests rejected due to invalid ticket / sec
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 02 - Security(_Total)\CWA - 001 - Requests rejected due to invalid ticket / sec

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 02 - Security(_Total)\CWA - 001 - Requests rejected due to invalid ticket / sec
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 02 - Security(_Total)\CWA - 001 - Requests rejected due to invalid ticket / sec

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 02 - Security(_Total)\CWA - 001 - Requests rejected due to invalid ticket / sec
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 02 - Security(_Total)\CWA - 001 - Requests rejected due to invalid ticket / sec

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the per-second rate of requests that were rejected due to an invalid ticket in the request. This problem occurs occasionally under normal circumstances, but spikes can be symptomatic of a denial of service attack or hacking attempt.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 03 - User session Service CWA - 004 - Sessions failed to sign in
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 004 - Sessions failed to sign in

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 004 - Sessions failed to sign in
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 004 - Sessions failed to sign in

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 004 - Sessions failed to sign in
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 004 - Sessions failed to sign in

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of user sessions that failed to sign in to Office Communications Server since the Communicator Web Access virtual server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 03 - User session Service CWA - 007 - Total sessions timed out
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 007 - Total sessions timed out

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 007 - Total sessions timed out
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 007 - Total sessions timed out

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 007 - Total sessions timed out
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 007 - Total sessions timed out

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of Communicator Web Access user sessions that timed out due to communication failure with clients.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 03 - User session Service CWA - 016 - Requests to nonexistent sessions
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 016 - Requests to nonexistent sessions

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 016 - Requests to nonexistent sessions
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 016 - Requests to nonexistent sessions

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 016 - Requests to nonexistent sessions
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 016 - Requests to nonexistent sessions

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of requests targeting nonexistent sessions since the Communicator Web Access virtual server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CWA - 03 - User session Service CWA - 018 - Total requests failed
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 018 - Total requests failed

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 018 - Total requests failed
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 018 - Total requests failed

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 018 - Total requests failed
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CWA - 03 - User session Service(_Total)\CWA - 018 - Total requests failed

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of requests that failed to process since the Communicator Web Access virtual server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: MCX - 01 - User session Service MCX - 005 - Sessions failed to sign in
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 005 - Sessions failed to sign in

DATASOURCE.NAME: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 005 - Sessions failed to sign in
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 005 - Sessions failed to sign in

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 005 - Sessions failed to sign in
CHART.DATASOURCE: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 005 - Sessions failed to sign in

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of user sessions that failed to sign in to Office Communications Server since the Communicator Mobile Component virtual server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: MCX - 01 - User session Service MCX - 011 - Total sessions timed out
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 011 - Total sessions timed out

DATASOURCE.NAME: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 011 - Total sessions timed out
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 011 - Total sessions timed out

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 011 - Total sessions timed out
CHART.DATASOURCE: \MCX - 01 - User session Service(_Total)\MCX - 011 - Total sessions timed out

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter shows the total number of Communicator Mobile Component user sessions that timed out due to communication failure with clients.
